text: Psalm 136
Praise to God for His Creation and Deliverance
Give thanks to Yahweh, for \add he is\add* good,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the God of gods,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the Lord of lords,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* alone does great wonders,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* made the heavens with skill,\f + \fr 136:5 \ft Or “understanding” \f*
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* spread out the earth above the waters,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* made \add the\add* great lights,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
The sun to rule the day,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
The moon and stars to rule the night,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* struck Egypt through their firstborn,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And he brought Israel out from among them,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
With a strong hand and an outstretched arm,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* divided \add the\add* ⸤Red Sea⸥\f + \fr 136:13 \ft Literally “sea of reed” \f* in two,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And he let Israel cross over through the midst of it,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
But he tossed Pharaoh and his army into \add the\add* ⸤Red Sea⸥,\f + \fr 136:15 \ft Literally “sea of reed” \f*
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* led his people through the wilderness,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
To \add him who\add* struck great kings,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And he killed mighty kings,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
Sihon the king of the Amorites,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And Og the king of Bashan,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And he gave their land as an inheritance,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
An inheritance to Israel his servant,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
Who remembered us in our low estate,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
And he rescued us from our enemies,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
\add The one who\add* gives food to all flesh,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
Give thanks to the God of heaven,
for his loyal love \add endures\add* forever.
